thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Navios Maritime Acquisition Corp Q4 Basic Loss Per Share $0.08

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Navios Maritime Acquisition Corp Q4 Basic Loss Per Share $0.08
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Navios Maritime Acquisition Corp:
* NAVIOS MARITIME ACQUISITION CORPORATION REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* Q4 REVENUE FELL 25.2 PERCENT TO $50.3 MILLION * NAVIOS MARITIME - CONTRACTED 60.2% OF AVAILABLE DAYS ON CHARTER-OUT BASIS FOR 2018 SEEN TO GENERATE 2018 REVENUE OF ABOUT $86.4 MILLION
* QTRLY BASIC LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 * ‍AUTHORIZED A STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM FOR UP TO $25.0 MILLION OF COMMON STOCK, FOR TWO YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
